entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5 except minus 9 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast. High minus 5 except minus 9 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 12.
